item.title: When Satoshi Disappeared
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/271/ Stephan Livera: Pete, welcome to the show. Pete Rizzo: Hey. Well, thanks for having me glad to be here and excited to chat. Stephan Livera: Yeah, man. So I’ve had a chance to read your article about what happened when Satoshi disappeared, and I think it’s a good one to get into. But also just for listeners who don’t know you, can you just take a minute and just tell them a bit about yourself and your involvement in the Bitcoin world?
